titleStmt.title: The third advice to a painter, how to draw the effigies of the whore of Rome whose character is lively represented by a bad woman.
titleStmt.author: Marvell, Andrew, 1621-1678.
Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of, 1647-1680.

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Andrew Marvell and John Wilmot Rochester--cf. Osborne, M.T., Advice-to-a Painter poems, no. 25.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
